dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'MM/DD/YYYY') start_dt, (SELECT LISTAGG (TRIM(a.location_name), ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY TRIM(a.location_name)) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_name FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR('SCOULAR.' || REPLACE(:DEST,',',',SCOULAR.'), '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY INSTR('SCOULAR.' || REPLACE(:DEST,',',',SCOULAR.'), ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0)) a) dest_locs FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, s.dest_location_gid, (SELECT DISTINCT ifeat.item_feature_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item itm ON pi.item_gid = itm.item_gid INNER JOIN item_feature ifeat ON itm.item_gid = ifeat.item_gid WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ifeat.item_feature_qual_gid = s.dest_location_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) product, (SELECT DISTINCT oref.order_release_refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release_refnum oref ON ssul.order_release_gid = oref.order_release_gid AND oref.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CUSTOMER PO RELEASE NUMBER' WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) po_num, (SELECT loc.city FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = s.dest_location_gid) plant, TO_CHAR(s.end_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') end_date, (SELECT LISTAGG(ssref.refnum_value, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssref.refnum_value) FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line_refnum ssref ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssref.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssref.s_ship_unit_line_no = ssul.s_ship_unit_line_no AND ssref.s_sul_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOT MOISTURE' WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) moisture, (SELECT LISTAGG(ssref.refnum_value, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssref.refnum_value) FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line_refnum ssref ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssref.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssref.s_ship_unit_line_no = ssul.s_ship_unit_line_no AND ssref.s_sul_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOT PROTEIN' WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) protein, (SELECT LISTAGG(ssref.refnum_value, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssref.refnum_value) FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line_refnum ssref ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssref.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssref.s_ship_unit_line_no = ssul.s_ship_unit_line_no AND ssref.s_sul_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOT FAT' WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) fat, (SELECT LISTAGG(ssref.refnum_value, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssref.refnum_value) FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line_refnum ssref ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssref.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssref.s_ship_unit_line_no = ssul.s_ship_unit_line_no AND ssref.s_sul_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOT ASH' WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) ash, glog_util.remove_domain(s.source_location_gid) origin, sref.shipment_refnum_value commodity, ssuref.refnum_value lot_notes FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line_refnum ssuref ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_line_no = ssul.s_ship_unit_line_no AND ssuref.s_sul_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOT NOTES' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (:DEST IS NULL OR (NOT :DEST IS NULL AND s.dest_location_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR('SCOULAR.' || REPLACE(:DEST,',',',SCOULAR.'), '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY INSTR('SCOULAR.' || REPLACE(:DEST,',',',SCOULAR.'), ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0))) AND s.end_time >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY 3, 4, 5, 6
